Haha wo Tazunete Sanzenri (Movie): A compilation film of the Haha wo Tazunete Sanzenri series. Due to a box office slump, the film aired only for 1 week in theaters.
['Haha wo Tazunete Sanzenri', 'Marco: Haha wo Tazunete Sanzenri', 'Haha wo Tazunete Sanzenri Specials', 'Haha wo Tazunete Sanzenri (Special)', 'Eomma Chaja Sammanli']
